field.name: cache
field.label: Enable Cache
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: show_admin
field.label: Show Admin Panel
field.description: Show admin panel i.e. 'add event' and 'my events' in this module

field.name: modlegend_inccss
field.label: Include Events CSS
field.description: Tells the module if the module Events CSS should be included or not.

field.name: nonjeventsdisable
field.label: Disable on non-JEvents Pages
field.description: Hide the module when displayed on non-JEvents pages

field.name: hideinactivekids
field.label: Hide Inactive child categories
field.description: WHEN ENABLED HIDES INACTIVE CHILD CATEGORIES
